label: J. Kenji López-Alt Breaks Down the Science of Stir-Fry | WIRED

children.text: In a wok, fire, oil and metal combine in an explosive chemical reaction to create stir-fry. J. Kenji López-Alt literally wrote the book on the wok, and he's here to explain the science behind stir-fry
